messages.message: Noticing that when you execute multi-doc queries from the advanced model, the response often ends with `SOURCE`. Is this something we are appending? Strangely it also only happens with more bogus queries like "hi" but not on actual questions
Yep correct Aayush, I can modify the chain to strip the empty SOURCE from the answer. Created a  JIRA issue (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/DR-3394) to track.
